name: Obocchama-kun
description: Obocchama-kun is an action game based on the TV anime of the same name (which itself is based on a manga). Winning the game is basically achieved by getting to the end of each level and beating the boss (sometimes replaced by another special challenge). Of course there are also a variety of enemies (two different per level) running around which try to harm the protagonist. He has two weapons to use against them: either shooting them or, well, jumping in their face with his buttocks. There are also power ups to collect, e.g. weapon upgrades or summoning an ally which supports him through the rest of the stage. The protagonist also has the ability to transform himself, e.g. into a dog or a blind man.
developedBy: Arc Co., Ltd., Pack-In-Video Co., Ltd

shot.caption: Something strange is going on at Mt. Fuji.
Obocchama-kun transforms into a dog when holding "down".
This looks very irritating to say the least.

Could you sing Sting's "The dream of the blue turtles"?
Sing, and nearby food will transform into a power-up.
Got a helper for the rest of the stage.
